title: Synthesis, biological evaluation, molecular docking, MD simulation and DFT analysis of new 3-hydroxypyridine-4-one derivatives as anti-tyrosinase and antioxidant agents
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Sara Sadeghian, Fateme Zare, Mehdi Khoshneviszadeh, Arian Fathi Hafshejani, Farhang Salahshour, Ahmadreza Khodabakhshloo, Lotfollah Saghaie, Ghazal Goshtasbi, Zahra Sarikhani, Alireza Poustforoosh, Razieh Sabet, Hossein Sadeghpour
